::Lord Elder::
=A0
Elder looked around to the others in the shuttle.
=A0
El=
der: Well that changes things a bit. We don't have a Hot Rod to bring the M=
atrix back too. Pilot, take off and follow those Minions. We'll help Legacy=
 with this.
=A0
The shuttle soon takes off and heads in the same direction =
as Legacy and the Minions. They quickly catch up.
=A0
Elder: Continue to fi=
re at will.
=A0
The shuttle continues to fire plasma blasts at the Minions.=

=A0
OOC: I assume you'll correct the Rodimus/Atlantis thing after you read=
 my earlier post. So I ignored that part.

--- On Mon, 6/23/08, Super Cyclo=
nus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@y=
ahoo.com>
Subject: Re: At The Ark
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, =
June 23, 2008, 5:40 PM








> Elder listened to Legacy over the commlink=
. He knew what needed to be done.
> The Matrix Quest would have to be aband=
oned for now. They must destroy these
> two Minions quickly and go to the B=
lack Fortress to aid the Maximal rescue team... 
> and the Predacons. There=
 was just one thing about Legacy's statement that 
> took=A0over Elder's th=
oughts.
> 
> Elder: Corrupted Rodimus? What do you mean? We thought that he=
 and Nightlight
> were just being held captive by the Predacons.
=A0
Legacy=
 paused for a moment as he attempted to put his historical information into=
 succinct terms. =93THE AUTOBOT KNOWN AS HOTROD, THROUGH SOME UNKNOWN MEANS=
 WAS RECONFIGURED INTO A BEING KNOWN AS DARK RODIMUS. IN FACT IT WAS BECAUS=
E OF THIS THAT RODIMUS PRIME COULD NOT BERECOVERED, WHICH LEAD IN LARGE PAR=
T TO THE DEFEAT OF THE CYBERTRONIAN FORCES HERE ON EARTH . . . AND BEYOND.=
=94
=A0
Legacy paused as if checking his records, =93INTERESTINGLY, HE WAS =
NOT PRESENT AT THE INITIAL ONSLAUGHT OF CYCLONUS ON THE BLACK FORTRESS. CON=
JECTURAL ANALYSIS PUT HIM IN ATLANTIS AT THE TIME.=94
=A0
Legacy moved high=
er into the air as if prepared to fire on the fleeing minions, but instead =
did something else. With a coruscating beam of power he fired a radio wave =
blast at the duo, not attempting to destroy them in this maneuver, but to c=
ut off communication=92 s with anyone else. 
=A0
((OOC: I am not sure if an=
yone is familiar with Shockblast =96 the character Legacy is loosely based =
on, but he has the ability to hack communications and shut off communicatio=
ns systems . . . among other things))
=A0
Preston
(Legacy)
=A0
 










=
